name: Back Into the Cave
description:
In the midst of a mad and frustrating world, two friends discuss philosophy by way of caves and spaceships.

Controls

Move with the arrow keys
Jump with X

Controls are rebindable in-game.

Credits

Made by John Gabriel
Featuring the vocal talents of Kameron Watson and Jett Barker
Playtested by Sekoia

Back Into the Cave was made for the forty-sixth Godot Wild Jam.
